product_name: SunCloud Speedtrap Polarized Sunglasses - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The SunCloud Speedtrap Polarized Sunglasses help you stand out on the beach or on the slopes. They pair bright, retro style with full protection from harmful UV rays. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, injection-molded polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact-resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Grilamid(R) lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility in all temperatures and are extremely impact-resistant. SunCloud Speedtrap polarized sunglasses are designed to best fit medium profiles. Closeout.
short_description: The SunCloud Speedtrap Polarized Sunglasses help you stand out on the beach or on the slopes. They pair bright, retro style with full protection from harmful UV rays.
